caption.p: Effects of plant extracts on platelet concentrations in Wistar female rats exposed for a dose 2000 mg/kg in acute toxicity study. Note: Aa =A. aspera, Sp= S. punctata, Ra= R. abyssinicus, Cm= C. murale and Ap= A. pulcherrima. *P < 0.05, **p < 0.01,***p < 0.001 indicate significant changes in comparison with the normal control.
